title: Big Fish Audio - Cinematic Sound Design [KONTAKT,SXT,EXS24,WAV]
description:
=======[ Info ]======================================================================

Product: Cinematic Sound Design
Vendor: Big Fish Audio
Format: KONTAKT,SXT,EXS24,WAV
Website: bigfishaudio.com/Cinematic-Sound-Design
From: ASSiGN

Cinematic Sound Design features over 1.2 GB of Hollywood sound design elements in thirteen categories, created and compiled specifically for composers and producers of film and TV music.

Designed by Ric Viers (author of The Sound Effects Bible) and produced by Steve Sechi (Epic Drums), this collection includes such useful elements as drones, massive hits, whooshes, explosions, beds, risers, fireballs, and lots more.  A great tool for composers of trailers, promos, and ads, Cinematic Sound Design has also been formatted for Kontakt 3, Battery 3, EXS24, and Reason's NNXT. These patches can be used to load an arsenal of sound design elements into your DAW, providing a fast and convenient way to audition sounds without interrupting your workflow.

=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

For Kontakt:

- Open Kontakt or above
- Go to File tab
- Browse for the torrent folder
- Drag n Drop the NKI files into the Right Panel to use.

=======[ Extra ]=====================================================================

I DO NOT OWN THIS PRODUCT - IF YOU ENJOY IT, PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING TO SUPPORT OWNER!
